code: import React,{useEffect,useReducer,useRef}from"react";import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";const scales={mouseEnter:1.1,mouseLeave:1,mouseDown:0.9,mouseUp:1};const buttonStatesReducer=(_,action)=>{return scales[action];};const CountingButton=_ref=>{let{action,onClick,disabled}=_ref;const[scale,setButtonState]=useReducer(buttonStatesReducer,scales.mouseLeave);const buttonRef=useRef(null);useEffect(()=>{if(disabled){setButtonState("mouseLeave");}});return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{ref:buttonRef,style:{transform:`scale(${scale})`},className:"counter-button",onClick:onClick,onMouseEnter:()=>setButtonState("mouseEnter"),onMouseLeave:()=>setButtonState("mouseLeave"),onMouseDown:()=>setButtonState("mouseDown"),onMouseUp:()=>setButtonState("mouseUp"),onKeyDown:e=>{if((e.key==="Enter"||e.key===" ")&&scale!==scales.mouseDown)setButtonState("mouseDown");},onKeyUp:e=>{if((e.key==="Enter"||e.key===" ")&&scale!==scales.mouseUp)setButtonState("mouseUp");},disabled:disabled,children:action==="Increment"?"+":"-"});};export default CountingButton;
